message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $140. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $130?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still hoping to keep the cost under $130. Would you consider selling it to me for $128?
